text: Frank Leroy Farrar (April 2, 1929 - October 31, 2021) was an American politician. He was the 24th Governor of South Dakota. A Republican. He served as the state's attorney general from 1963 to 1969, and as governor from 1969 to 1971. Farrar died on October 31, 2021 in Pierre, South Dakota at the age of 92. ==References== ==Other websites== * National Governors Association: Frank Farrar * KDLT News: "Frank Farrar: A Man Made of Iron" * Ironman: "Meet Frank Farrar, Kona's Last Official Finisher in 2002" * Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American judges Category:Lawyers from South Dakota Category:Governors of South Dakota Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Businesspeople from South Dakota Category:People from Pierre, South Dakota
title: Frank Farrar
